_header: Lord as Thou art one God ever buten end
Subjects: religious instruction; instruction, religious; Biblical history
_description: The Fall of the Angels, Adam and Eve, Old Testament History, Life of Christ, etc. — 344 verses in quatrains

CamTCC323.First Lines:
Louerd asse þu ard on god ever buten hendeÞou þat
                    lesedest adam ut of helle bendeHic bidde þe for…
CamTCC323.Last Lines:
…Sein gregori prechede wid þe guldene mouþeIc tales
                    þat he told heo beit þeit ful coiþe
